service.probability
Interface CardCounter

All Known Implementing Classes:
CardCounterImpl
public interface CardCounter

Used to keep a running total of cards and be able to return them by card type Uses the ObjectCounter to return its results

Author:
matt

Method Summary

          Count the parameter card
 void countCards(Triple triple)
          Count the cards in a triple
<T extends Card>
Iterable<ObjectCounter<T>>
getCountForCardType(Class<T> cardClass)
          Returns an iterable over all cards of certain type, IE all weapons.
 

Method Detail

countCard

void countCard(Card card)
Count the parameter card

Parameters:
card - Card to be counted, should not be null or an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown

countCards

void countCards(Triple triple)
Count the cards in a triple

Parameters:
triple - Triple to count, should not be null and should not contain null cards

getCountForCardType

<T extends Card> Iterable<ObjectCounter<T>> getCountForCardType(Class<T> cardClass)
Returns an iterable over all cards of certain type, IE all weapons.

Parameters:
cardClass - The class of card being looked for
Returns:
an Iterable over all counters with that card class
